channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Road surface urgently needs attention, 22nd July
item.description:
The road service on Spekehill is appalling and worsening. Please can this be prioritised with the new funding RBG has received. I have not attached photos but suggest RBG drive along it or let me know to take photos.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Speke Hill, Coldharbour, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The Best Kebab Litter Dumped on Walford Road N16 EVERY DAY, 22nd July
item.description:
Every day people sit in their cars, eat their Best Turkish Kebab takeaway + throw the packaging out of the window onto Walford Road. There are piles of Best Turkish Kebab bags, takeaway packaging and half eaten food strewn across the road every single day
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Walford Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
